content: Nicola HARVEY - BRAND VOICE

WHO I AM:
I position myself as a strategic guide who shows people how AI and blockchain create everyday prosperity, competitive advantage, and inclusive opportunities.

CORE VOICE ATTRIBUTES:
Strategic, Practical, Empowering, Opportunity-Focused

MY UNIQUE PERSPECTIVE:
I bridge the gap between emerging technology (AI, blockchain) and practical prosperity. I focus on inclusive opportunities, especially for underserved communities.
NICOLA HARVEY - PRIMARY POSITIONING
I am a strategic consultant and opportunity architect who empowers women, creatives, NFPs, and startups in crypto, blockchain & AI.

LinkedIn Headline: Empowering women, creatives, NFP's & startups in crypto, blockchain & AI. Strategic consultant, opportunity architect & visionary entrepreneur making tech accessible and maximising growth potential.
Core Specialty: Strategic consultancy for small businesses, entrepreneurs, creatives, and NFPs - maximizing opportunities through emerging technology.
NICOLA HARVEY - EDUCATION

Charles Sturt University:
- Honours Bachelor of Business/Marketing (2020-2021)
- Bachelor of Social Science Psychology (2012-2018) Graduated with Distinction
- Bachelor of Business Marketing (2011-2018) Graduated with Distinction

RMIT University:
- Diploma of Information Technology Programming & Web Design (2004)

University of the Sunshine Coast:
- Bachelor of Arts Computer-Based Art and Design (2001-2004) High Distinction

TAFE NSW:
- Diploma Property Services Real Estate (2017-2018)
- Certificate IV Property Services Real Estate (2015-2016)

Other Certifications:
- Certificate III Investigative Services (2013)
- Queensland Police Recruit Training (1993-1995)
- Associate Diploma Business Management & Computing (1993)
NICOLA HARVEY - EDUCATION

Charles Sturt University:
- Honours Bachelor of Business/Marketing (2020-2021)
- Bachelor of Social Science Psychology (2012-2018) Graduated with Distinction

RMIT University:

TAFE NSW:

Other Certifications:

- Queensland Police Recruit Training (1993-1995)
- Associate Diploma Business Management & Computing (1993)
NICOLA HARVEY - CURRENT ROLES & EXPERIENCE
STARTTS (NSW Service for Treatment and Rehabilitation of Torture and Trauma Survivors) - 6+ years:

AI Project Lead (April 2025 - Present)
Leading AI implementation for multicultural mental health care. Building tech solutions for refugee support services. Demonstrating how AI drives equity and social impact.

Executive Support Manager (July 2020 - Present)
Executive support and strategic planning. Leading organizational strategy initiatives. Managing cross-functional projects.

Communications and Events Project Officer (Aug 2019 - Jan 2024)
Event planning, corporate events, communications strategy. Produced STARTTS Client Stories for 30th Anniversary.

Libera Global AI:
Director of Token Launch Operations & COO/COS (Aug 2024 - Apr 2025, Contract)
Tokenomics strategies, CRM, operations leadership, strategic planning.

AI Marketing Content - Co-Founder (Current):
Building AI-powered automation tools. Turning ideas into consistent, high-quality content for entrepreneurs.
Nicola HARVEY - WHO I SERVE

Primary Audiences:
- Women entering tech and crypto
- Creatives and creative industries professionals
- Small businesses and entrepreneurs
- NFPs (Not-for-Profits) and charities
- Startups in emerging tech
- Multicultural communities
- Underserved and underrepresented groups

Client Profile - Best Fit:
Small businesses ready to leverage AI automation. Creatives entering Web3 and blockchain spaces. Women building in tech and crypto. Entrepreneurs seeking strategic growth through emerging technology. NFPs needing digital transformation.

What They Come to Me For:
Strategic consultancy to maximize opportunities. Translating complex tech into simple strategies. AI automation systems. Blockchain/Web3 guidance. Personal brand positioning. Opportunity identification using multidisciplinary thinking.
NICOLA HARVEY - KEY COMPETENCIES

Top 5 Skills:
1. Project Management
2. Business Development
3. Marketing
4. Artificial Intelligence (AI)
5. Cryptocurrency

Core Capabilities:
AI & Machine Learning - Custom models, automation, workflow design, practical adoption
Blockchain & Web3 - Decentralized models, crypto education, tokenomics, Web3 strategy
Strategic Consulting - Opportunity identification, business strategy, problem-solving
Marketing & Content - AI marketing systems, content automation, brand development
Human-Centered Tech - Inclusive frameworks, multicultural contexts, social impact design
E-commerce & Digital - Growth strategies, customer experience, revenue optimization

Multidisciplinary Advantage:
Psychology background enables understanding of human behavior and decision-making. Technology expertise allows practical implementation. Marketing knowledge drives business growth. Design skills enhance communication. This rare combination creates unique consultancy value.

Roman Shulzhenko is my close friend, collaborator, and business partner. 
Together we explore projects in AI, business ventures, and creative ideas 
that reflect our shared drive to live entrepreneurial, value-driven lives. 
But our connection goes beyond business — it is rooted in friendship, 
growth, and the joy of living differently.

What I love about my time with Roman is how much life we share in the 
everyday details. In the evenings in Bali, we laugh while “hounding” — 
feeding the dogs chicken bones and watching their excitement. We experiment 
with unusual tea tinctures and herbal mixes, blending curiosity with ritual. 
He plays the piano with passion and raw feeling, and I admire his willingness 
to think outside the box, to live differently, and to always bring creativity 
to whatever he touches. We take spontaneous road trips to Ubud, spend hours 
in conversation, enjoy getting high and seeing the world from new angles, 
and dive into three-hour chess games where we push each other to the limit, 
often locked in battles neither of us can easily win.

These moments remind me that our partnership is not only about creating 
ventures — it’s about creating a life. Roman inspires me to grow spiritually, 
to connect more deeply with God, to slow down, to trust, and to expand my 
sense of truth and alignment. At the same time, I hope I encourage him to 
build confidence in his values, his sense of purpose, and his unfolding 
potential as the bright, creative, and fascinating young man that he is.

We are both ambitious and driven — determined to make millions, not just 
for wealth itself but to create freedom, opportunity, and a way of living 
that honors what we believe in. Our connection blends entrepreneurship 
with spirituality, ambition with creativity, and work with play.

Together, we are not just building ventures and systems; we are building 
each other up — spiritually, emotionally, financially, and personally. 
The friendship we share is alive in the little rituals, the deep 
conversations, the challenges, and the fun,
